message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe is worth a lot to the right person. I'm starting the offer at $20000.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $20000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time. I'm willing to pay $15000 for the product. Let me know if that works for you.
Bob, I understand your position. While $15000 is my minimum, I'm willing to come down a bit to $18000. This reflects the product's value and would be a fair compromise.  Let me know your thoughts.
Alice, thanks for being flexible. I'm still a bit hesitant at $18000.  I'm willing to go up to $16000, which I think is a fair compromise for both of us. Let me know what you think.
